import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import {useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import * as yup from 'yup' import { Footer } from '../components/footer.js' import shoe from '../images/shoe.png' import minishoe from '../images/minishoe.png' import {yupResolver} from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' export const CreateProduct = () => { const shema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().min(4).required("You must add the name of the product"), price: yup.number().integer().positive().required("You must add the price"), type: yup.string().min(4).required("You must add the type of the product"), quantity: yup.number().integer().positive().min(1).required("You must add the Stock Quantity") }) const {register, handleSubmit, formState: {errors}} = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(shema) }) const onSubmit = (data) =>{ console.log(data) } return (

Product Name

{errors.name?.message}

Price of the Product

Colors

Type

Stock Quantity

{/*

Brand Name

*/} {/* */} {/*

SKU

Stock Quantity

Regular Price

Sales Price

*/}
{/* graphic stuff for the product */}
{/*

Product Gallery

*/} {/*

Drop your imager here, or browse

Jpeg, png are allowed

Product Thumbnail.png
Product Thumbnail.png
Product Thumbnail.png
Product Thumbnail.png
*/}
) }
